goofyenchants.title: Goofy Enchantments
enchantment.goofyenchants.uno_reverse.de: Reflects damage when blocking with a shield
enchantment.goofyenchants.big.desc: Turns into a giant when wearing a helmet with this enchantment
enchantment.goofyenchants.small.desc: Turns into an ant when wearing a helmet with this enchantment
enchantment.goofyenchants.randomness.des: Chance to drop random items when breaking a block
enchantment.goofyenchants.combustion.des: Arrows have a chance of exploding when hitting an enemy
